metadata.titleEn: Data set of trace elements, sulfur and lead isotopes in KEKETALE lead zinc deposit
metadata.titleCn: 可可塔勒铅锌矿微量元素、硫铅同位素数据集
metadata.description: The influence of deformation and metamorphism of post volcanic massive sulfide on the trace elements and sulfur lead isotopic composition of sulfide is still unclear. The Keketale VMS Pb Zn (- Ag) deposit provides an opportunity to solve the above problems; Five ore samples from No.7 and No.9 orebodies were crushed and screened for lead isotope analysis of bulk minerals, 17 polished thick sulfide samples were used for in-situ trace element and sulfur lead isotope analysis, 66 trace element determination points were analyzed, and 25 sulfur isotope points were determined; A total of 18 point pairs of different minerals were selected for lead isotope analysis, and LA-ICP-MS method was used
metadata.descriptionCn: 后火山成因块状硫化物变形变质作用对硫化物微量元素和硫铅同位素组成的影响尚不清楚，可可塔勒 VMS 铅锌(- Ag)矿床，为解决上述问题提供了机遇；对采自7号和9号矿体的5个矿石样品进行粉碎、过筛用以大宗矿产铅同位素分析，17个抛光厚片硫化物样品用于原位微量元素与硫铅同位素分析，对硫化物矿物进行了66个微量元素测定点分析，测定了25个硫同位素点；共选取了不同矿物的18个点对进行铅同位素分析，运用了LA-ICP-MS的分析方式
metadata.instructions:
File name: KEKETALE lead-zinc deposit trace elements, sulfur lead isotope data set, the name of the file is "KEKETALE trasl. Xlsl", in which KEKETALE represents KEKETALE lead-zinc deposit, trasl trace elements, sulfur lead isotope
Data reading mode: all ASCII files in the data set can be directly opened by Excel
metadata.instructionsCn:
文件命名：可可塔勒铅锌矿痕量元素、硫铅同位素数据集，文件的名称为“keketaletrasl.xlsl”，其中keketale代表可可塔勒铅锌矿床，trasl微量元素、硫铅同位素
数据读取方式：该数据集中的所有ASCII码文件可以直接用Excel打开

literatureList.titleEn: race elemental and sulfur-lead isotopic variations in metamorphosed volcanogenic massive sulfide (VMS) mineralization systems: An example from the Keketale Pb-Zn(-Ag) deposit, NW China
literatureList.referenceEn: Yu, P.P., Zheng, Y., Wang, C.M. (2020). Trace elemental and sulfur-lead isotopic variations in metamorphosed volcanogenic massive sulfide (VMS) mineralization systems: An example from the Keketale Pb-Zn(-Ag) deposit, NW China. Ore Geology Reviews,125, 103685.

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of how a dataset on trace elements and sulfur-lead isotopes can be used to study the effects of deformation and metamorphism on VMS lead-zinc(-Ag) deposits?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个关于如何使用微量元素和硫铅同位素数据集来研究变形和变质对VMS铅锌（-银）矿床影响的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: A dataset collected from the Keketale VMS lead-zinc(-Ag) deposit includes trace element and sulfur-lead isotope analyses, which can be used to study the effects of deformation and metamorphism. The data involves crushing and sieving ore samples for bulk lead isotope analysis and using LA-ICP-MS for in-situ trace element and sulfur-lead isotope analysis on polished thick sections. This approach provides insights into how these geological processes influence the composition of sulfide minerals.
Example.AnswerCn: 从Keketale VMS铅锌(-银)矿床收集的数据集包括微量元素和硫铅同位素分析，这些数据可以用来研究变形和变质的影响。数据涉及对矿石样品进行破碎和筛分以进行整体铅同位素分析，并使用激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱法（LA-ICP-MS）对抛光厚片进行原位微量元素和硫铅同位素分析。这种方法提供了对这些地质过程如何影响硫化矿物成分的深入见解。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of the data collection methods used for analyzing trace elements and lead-sulfur isotopes in VMS lead-zinc(-Ag) mineral deposits?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于分析VMS铅锌（-银）矿床中的微量元素和铅-硫同位素的数据收集方法的特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: crushing and sieving ore samples, polished thick section sulfide samples, LA-ICP-MS, 66 measurement points for trace elements, 25 points for sulfur isotopes, 18 points for lead isotope analysis
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 破碎和筛分矿石样品，抛光厚片硫化物样品，LA-ICP-MS，66个微量元素测量点，25个硫同位素测量点，18个铅同位素分析点。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many microelement measurement points are included in a dataset related to sulfide minerals in the context of VMS lead-zinc deposits?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在与VMS铅锌矿床相关的硫化矿物数据集中包含多少个微量元素测量点？

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What can the use of LA-ICP-MS for in-situ microelement and lead isotope analysis tell us about the effectiveness of this method in understanding deformation and metamorphic effects on sulfide mineral composition?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: LA-ICP-MS用于原位微量元素和铅同位素分析可以告诉我们这种方法在理解变形和变质对硫化物矿物成分的影响方面的有效性吗？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The use of LA-ICP-MS for in-situ microelement and lead isotope analysis provides detailed information on the elemental and isotopic composition of sulfide minerals. This allows researchers to effectively assess the impact of deformation and metamorphic processes on the mineral composition by analyzing the variations in microelement and isotope data collected from sulfide samples.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 使用激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICP-MS）进行原位微量元素和铅同位素分析，可以提供硫化矿物的元素和同位素组成的详细信息。这使研究人员能够通过分析从硫化物样品中收集的微量元素和同位素数据的变化，有效评估变形和变质过程对矿物组成的影响。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the challenges in accurately analyzing trace elements and isotope compositions in VMS lead-zinc deposits, and how do these challenges affect the data collection methods?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在分析VMS铅锌矿床中的微量元素和同位素组成时，哪些因素导致了挑战，这些挑战如何影响数据收集方法？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The deformation and metamorphism of volcanic massive sulfide deposits can complicate the trace element and sulfur-lead isotope compositions, making it challenging to obtain accurate analyses. These challenges necessitate the use of sophisticated data collection methods such as LA-ICP-MS for in-situ microanalysis, which can help isolate and accurately measure the isotopic and trace element variations across different mineral samples.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 火山大规模硫化物矿床的变形和变质会使微量元素和硫铅同位素组成变得复杂，从而使获得准确分析变得具有挑战性。这些挑战需要使用先进的数据收集方法，如激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICP-MS）进行原位微量分析，这可以帮助隔离并准确测量不同矿物样品中的同位素和微量元素变化。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential effects on the understanding of sulfide mineral deformation and metamorphism when utilizing data collection methods that analyze microelements and sulfur-lead isotopes in lead-zinc(-Ag) deposits?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 利用分析微量元素和硫铅同位素的数据收集方法，对铅锌（-银）矿床的硫化矿物变形和变质的理解可能产生的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The potential effects include a deeper insight into how deformation and metamorphism impact the composition of microelements and sulfur-lead isotopes, which could provide opportunities to resolve uncertainties regarding post-volcanic massive sulfide genesis.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 潜在的影响包括更深入地了解变形和变质如何影响微量元素和硫铅同位素的组成，这可能为解决与后火山大规模 sulfide 形成相关的不确定性提供机会。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the goal of analyzing the microelement and sulfur-lead isotope composition in sulfide minerals from VMS lead-zinc deposits using LA-ICP-MS?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 使用LA-ICP-MS分析VMS铅锌矿床中硫化物矿物的微量元素和硫-铅同位素组成的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal is to understand the impact of post-volcanic deformation and metamorphism on the microelement and sulfur-lead isotope composition of sulfide minerals in the Keketale VMS lead-zinc(-Ag) deposit, providing insights into the geological processes affecting these minerals.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是了解火山后变形和变质作用对Keketale VMS铅锌（-银）矿床中硫化矿物微量元素和硫铅同位素组成的影响，从而提供对影响这些矿物的地质过程的见解。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the procedural steps involved in using LA-ICP-MS for analyzing microelements and lead isotopes in sulfide minerals from a dataset?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 使用LA-ICP-MS分析数据集中硫化物矿物中的微量元素和铅同位素的程序步骤是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The procedural steps involve crushing and sieving ore samples for bulk lead isotope analysis, preparing polished thick sections of sulfide samples for in-situ analysis, performing microelement determination at 66 points on sulfide minerals, and conducting lead isotope analysis at 18 points using LA-ICP-MS.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 程序步骤包括对矿石样品进行破碎和筛分以进行大宗铅同位素分析，制备硫化物样品的抛光厚片以进行原位分析，在硫化矿物上进行66个点的微量元素测定，以及在18个点上使用激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱法（LA-ICP-MS）进行铅同位素分析。
